"},{"id":9,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561197999059553 (-=KCSB=- KG)","alts":null,"description":"hey and well ban was long long time ago  right now 438 days and well i know i was stupid and i dont even know why i did it  maybe i was just stupid  i learned what i did wrong and i know i dont want to scamm <.< right now i dont trade much with strange people i only trade with close friends but i am banned on scrap.tf and marketplace.tf  at the time i was banned i was a donater of scrap.tf and now i cant use it anymore there are many websites i cant use anymore and i hate myself for this shit i did around 440 days ago the next reason is i cant play anymore on your servers without getting kicked when it is full i love the orange_x3 server but i always get kicked i feel bad for the shit i did at this time and i feel bad for the people i did it too but i dont want the tag anymore its a shame for my soul and for my heart its a shame in my life i mean playing tf2 is a part of my life  i play it since many years and have over 6100 hours in the game  i love the game and the people but they hate me cuz of the tag and i can understand it i hate myself to for the tag and for the shit i did at this time now after many days i may see the chance to get a downgrade or a remove so i can use scrap.tf or marketplace.tf again and can play on any server i want my profil and backpack will be always public so you can guys can see everything i did  the reason why i am that late with the appeal  i was just nervouse and i dont want to fail  i hope you can understand it and i will get a downgrade or a remove tf2 is just my love :c   ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":313,"locked":1,"creator_id":50,"modificator_id":50,"created_at":"17.08.2016 22:57:33","updated_at":"2016-08-23 23:41:06","state":"Archived","assignee":"

He banned me for nothing i mnot scammer!!!! And he gave me a title " fog scammer" i heared about fog yesterday lol -_- Just give me a reason banning me for nothing and rejecting my appeals?? I willnot stop posting appeals because i got ban for nothing!! www.f-o-g.trade/appeals/21 www.f-o-g.treade/appeals/22 [MENTION=2]Tio José das Vacas[/MENTION]‍ ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":248,"locked":1,"creator_id":90,"modificator_id":90,"created_at":"10.09.2016 18:04:22","updated_at":"2016-09-10 18:30:19","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":39,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198258644332 (snbi.)","alts":null,"description":"Hello, my name is snbi. About 4 months ago, I was involved in helping a friend with brokering one of his 12 key unusuals, in which I scammed him. You can go and see this appeal I made the day after in which it got denied: http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/12184-steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-snbi.html I'm just here to hopefully get a downgrade from my "scammer" tag, to a "caution" tag. The only reason I'm asking for this is because I don't want to keep this negativity on my steamrep/other trading websites for any longer. Now I cannot change what I did in the past, which was foolish, but I can change change the future by making good decisions and trying to have a decent reputation among the community. I recently decided to come back to playing TF2 and start trying to trade again because I had quit due to having to focus more on my classes, home stuff, etc... Anyway, my point is that I have learned my lesson from scamming my friend, and would like to ask one of the moderators to hopefully view this post and downgrade my tag from "scammer", to "caution" Thank you for taking the time to read this for whoever got assigned this appeal. [b]-Snbi[/b]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":77,"locked":1,"creator_id":120,"modificator_id":120,"created_at":"01.10.2016 00:20:25","updated_at":"2016-10-01 15:20:44","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":44,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198158102694 (Marakesh)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I realise I made a big mistake by impersonating a CS:GO Pin admin, I wouldn't ever do something like that again. I would like to be unbanned, I learnt my lesson of trying to scam someone, I never scammed anyone, that was my only and failed one. Have already made an appeal, didn't get approved, I still have hope...I cannot use reddit, csgolounge, any trade servers to trade my items on there because of the ban... All my alts got banned aswell, I never use them, forgot the password to them all. I really can't trade with the steamrep mark, I hope you can understand me. Will provide all the evidence from the time period when I got reported. This happened 269 days ago. I will give my promise that I will never cause problems related to Steam ever again. I'm very sorry once and for all. Made a big mistake doing that. It's been almost one full year with the tag.  I can't get over the fact that I'm marked on here.  I want to apologize to advicebanana especially. I'm very sorry for causing problems.[/i]","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/0cfe7476e7ca29gf4bd8eab52a7cga75 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":153,"locked":1,"creator_id":83,"modificator_id":83,"created_at":"08.10.2016 23:30:48","updated_at":"2016-10-09 10:34:43","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":60,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198248557120 (Wolf)","alts":null,"description":"Hello. *When* A month or 2 back i was heavy boxing with a guy named "Killer". *Where and what* He invited me to a server to heavy box. If i remember correctly he wagered his pool party taunt not his genuine ap-sap, but that's what i tihnk. My ping at the time was around 150 to 200 i was lagging and tried telling him that i had lag but he ignored. I didn't wanna leave but i didn't want to keep fighting due to my ping, so i didn't know what to do. *At the end* I lost and i refused to give him my items because i was telling him that i was lagging. After that i change my name 'cause i sorta felt bad and joined back. Then i tried to give him my items but due to my ping i kept trying to drag/double click them but they wouldn't go in. He thought i was lying and filed a report against me. I do not have photo evidence due to i had not uploaded the screenshots. Goodbye.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":107,"locked":1,"creator_id":162,"modificator_id":162,"created_at":"01.11.2016 15:00:37","updated_at":"2016-12-20 15:21:16","state":"Archived","assignee":"

","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":61,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"[u][b]You were reported because?[/b][/u] I was reported for impersonating SteamRep admins and the report for me was read and accepted. I have not met and personally talked with any of the admins but I do not believe that matter the most. I personally believe [u]defraud[/u] was not the word I would use, as I had not asked anyone for items to "Check", "Borrow", or "Use for a moment"! I will give you the benifit of the doubt, because there is no way to tell if I did ask for items or not. [b][u]What makes you feel different?[/u][/b] Honestly I really haven't attempted to defraud, as said before, but I still confirm this as a "Change of Heart" appeal. I would consider it a different feel because I do not see anytime in my future impersonating an admin. If I do have my account change to impersonate or attempt scam I would gladly be reported while I sort out the issue. Weather it was me being hacked, or my family interacting with my computer I would gladly like to know what happened. I will most likely start recording soon if I can get my quality better (If I get a way to contact whoever is reading) and if I record I would obviously not attempt scam in my videos. I know how getting scammed feels as my friend on steam (DuderJ) was scammed for his [u]whole[/u] inventory and now only has a few skins left. I still understand how impersonating admins is an offense so I understand being banned on SteamRep [b][u]I don't see any [real] proof[/u][/b] The only proof I can give you is a screenshot of my page, (as well as my friends blank inv.) as you already have my steam id and you can easily check my profile to see how I am doing. Notice! I will always keep my "Working on my +SteamRep ban..." on my profile until I get an appeal approved. My last appeal was denied and my other one was not assessed yet. I will not spam this page with appeals anymore I will wait before my next one if this is not accepted. As always I thank the person(s) reading this and might meet you again.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/f58a72gadebd0ea43eb7703a43851af9 https://files.f-o-g.eu/e43fb7a3c0d98g78db59814d19131e22 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":141,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"01.11.2016 21:39:56","updated_at":"2016-11-01 21:49:12","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":62,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"I HAVE BEEN FALSIFIED REPORTED AND I AM ANGRY FOR HOW I HAVE BEEN ADRESSED! [u][b]FIRST OFF[/b][/u] how have a been reported for attempt to defraud if you have no real proof that I attempted to defraud. Yes! I did copy their profiles but did I attempt to defraud. Because defraud means to "illegally obtain money from (someone) by deception" DID i attempt or succeed in that process? [b][u]SECOND OFF[/u][/b] How is my report denied for lying. Once again you have no proof that I did [u]not[/u] trade with this guy for his doppler karambit. [b]If[/b] I did do that then I understand my report> but I would not have lied.[b]If[/b] I did [u]not[/u] do that then I did not attempt to defraud! So I really want an explanation because I really get the good side of the matter (A win - win) [b][u]THE END[/u][/b] Hope you enjoyed! Next time think... please...","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":109,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"02.11.2016 01:08:55","updated_at":"2016-11-02 18:12:58","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":86,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198089757674 (Zelda the legend)","alts":null,"description":"i have already made an appeal before 94days https://f-o-g.trade/appeals/17   sir i dint have any intention to scam any steam members or those who seek to trade with edward.. what happened? one of my friend/guy named harley quinn added me after i was kicked by admin edward.he asked me to do a favour to him by helping to get evidence against admin edward.. what i did before? i accept what i did i helped him to get evidence against  admin edward by changing my name to "Edward|Buying Keys 1.70€ SKRIL" 1)he added me and requested me to change my profile 2)he showed me chats stating that he got scammed 3)i changed my name  4)he told to change my name back and blocked me for 2 days what i am now? i am requesting this appeal because i am a different person now and never had intention to scam edward or his traders moreover  i am an admin of this group "https://steamcommunity.com/groups/OfficialZues" which has more than 10,000 followers. now i feel that what is to be an admin. thanks  ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":286,"locked":1,"creator_id":68,"modificator_id":68,"created_at":"30.11.2016 07:30:36","updated_at":"2016-11-30 16:24:21","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":87,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198071579195 (Dicksteele)","alts":null,"description":" Before I begin, I would like to point out that I was reported for impersonating an admin and middle-man named Schmed (https://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198065759429) In response to that report, yes, I did impersonate him, however not for any malicious or scamming intents. The use of impersonating Schmed was purely for trolling/ pranking a group of scammers. To begin, I was in a skype call with my friend [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198078739355]Twnty[/url] (http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198078739355) when he was contacted by a Scammer/Trader named Dazed ( I cant find his profile nor profile link as they do not exist anymore) wanting to trader his knife for twnty's knife. During Twnty's conversation with Dazed on steam, Dazed, had said that he wanted to verify Twnty's knife's legitimacy through the use of a "Steam Admin" so as to prevent the trade of any glitched / bugged items being exchanged. This immedietly alerted me and Twnty that the person contacting him was a scammer and we decided to play along acting dumb. Soon after, Dazed had linked Twnty a link of a person named "Gara" an impersontor of an actual middleman/ trade admin and provided Twnty this link - [url]https://steamcommunity.com/id/GaraOfficialsteamAdmin1/[/url] . This link of which no longer works due to the scammer changing his profile URL after this debacle.  Twnty does have video evidence of this occuring and I will provide the link to it later on. After getting added on steam by Gara, the three of them get into a group chat containing Dazed,Gara and Twnty.  At this point, I decide to troll the two scammers by impersonating an admin named Schmed, the person I was accused of impersonating. I would like to point out at this point that my impersonation of the admin was never used for any malicious or scamming intent and was purely for pranking/trolling the scammers who had messaged my friend, Twnty. After that, I joined the group chat with the scammers and trolled them before they finally left when they realized that I was a fake.  In conclusion, yes, I had impersonated Schmed, a trade midldeman/admin, albeit not intended for any malicious purposes and just for fun to prank/troll a bunch of scammers who had contacted me and my friend. To further make it obvious that my profile was a fake and not intended to be a serious impersonation, I had changed my of the profiles details to make it look like so. An example would be the changing of "Lethal  Zone Trade" to "Abu Hajar Traders" and another example was the changing of the SteamRep profile link to Schmeds profile to instead link to my profile. This would have shown a "No Special status" tag instead of a "Middleman/Administrator" tag.This was done to prevent people from thinking that I was a real admin and to show obvious tell-tale signs that my profile impersonation was a joke.  Before I finish, should you require any additional information about the subject, you may contact [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198078739355]Twnty[/url] at his profile page so that he can substantiate my claims. To reiterate, I did not use the impersonated profile for any bad/malicious intents and was purely for entertainment albeit a rule offence. I was before myself a trader and understand what its like to have been scammed and I would never scam or participate in any such activities. I would also like to point out that I wouldnt risk getting my account banned in any form because it is my main and only active account which contains all my games and is of great value to me.  To finish, I would like to thank you for considering my appeal and I would like to stress my innocence in this situation.","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/297gc76f9397adf1ff4757d84ab8ge17","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":47,"locked":1,"creator_id":200,"modificator_id":200,"created_at":"30.11.2016 09:00:42","updated_at":"2016-12-01 10:13:19","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":103,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198177886361 (Orion Nebulae)","alts":null,"description":"I did not mean to cause a violation / get banned by changing my name to an admin. I regret this, and simply was trying to prank a friend. I was not doing this to steal items or money. In addition, the two accounts that have been marked as my "alts" are not mine. They are, in fact, my real life friends, one of which who lives across the street, and the other lives closely down the block. They barely use Steam anymore, but they have no relation whatsoever to me in this manner. My entire time on Steam I have been a fair and honest trader. I recently gambled off most of my team fortress 2 inventory, and now I have taken interest in CS:GO trading. I am filing this appeal because I want to continue trading without being blown off by others after they see I have an incorrect scammer tag. I truly attempting to prank a friend by pretending to be an admin, and it won't happen again. I am also unsure of how you decided who my alternate accounts are, but they aren't my alts. If you need me to provide evidence on how they are not my alts, please contact me and I will try to fulfill the requirement. Occasionally my friends have brought their computers over to my house to play games such as team fortress 2, but other than that we have no relationship other than nearby friends. I have displayed my trade history below, showing no shady business in my past trades.","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/9699c5933beaf8d0f0309215g71663ce","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":242,"locked":1,"creator_id":218,"modificator_id":218,"created_at":"13.12.2016 00:41:47","updated_at":"2016-12-13 00:50:58","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":107,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198216292831 (CSGO 1.COM ???? JUST DO IT !)","alts":null,"description":"Hello, I am the administrator and owner of a small but honest gambling web-site that has been running for more than 1.5 years. I wrote an appeal ( https://f-o-g.trade/appeals/106 ) and after it was rejected, I realized my mistake, I'll write about it below: Like any other site we need a periodic change accounts bots (with the 403 Steam error) I always bought ready-made accounts, because waiting 15 days activation of Steam Guard - is a long time. Accounts we bought at forums and shops (not hacked accounts, people specially recorded accounts to sales, expected 15 days of activation Steam Guard and sell). But sometimes there are not good sellers who have 'recover' accounts, which were sold and sell them a second time in their shops. I think this account https://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198204836649 was one of 'recovering' acc by one of bad seller, and next buyer is a scammer. But i never do these things. I always work honestly, we have a web-site with 400-1000 unique players per day and works from May 2015. Now we have 118,085 unique players in our database, and I have never engaged in deception as the account which I have recorded as ALT. I realize my mistake that I purchased accounts for the site could be used after the recovering by bad seller for any purpose, and also fraud. For this reason, I refuse to purchase accounts, the situation is not repeated in the future never. I am aware that our web-site violates the Steam policy because it uses their API automatically. But I am not a scammer. I do not want that on my profile was a bad tag (FoG ban). I realize all my mistakes and nothing like this will never happen again. Very much hope that you will understand me and forgive. Thank you a lot.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":230,"locked":1,"creator_id":223,"modificator_id":223,"created_at":"15.12.2016 17:10:14","updated_at":"2016-12-15 18:01:13","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":129,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198221663464 (Jenkins)","alts":null,"description":"Dear FoG-Team, before I start I wanted to say that I try to be as transparent as I can be and hopefully that's enough. I was banned on steamrep over a year ago and I actually understand that. I also made a Ban Appeal back in May 2016 which got rejected because I didn't had all the information I needed to and because of my "story changed too many times", I'm really sorry for that. Then I made a break from CS GO until now, where I came back to play because I got motivated by the Eleague Major and my friends. And now, as I started to play again, I don't want that people look on my SteamRep profile and see:"Oh, this guy is a scammer", because I'm not. This is my story so far: I got this ban for impersonating "Someone" on my old Steam account, I really regret this, because I was doing this out of rage caused by a scammer who scammed me with impersonating "Someone". I know that was so silly and now over a year later I think I can stand above that:"I got scammed because I was too dumb and don't have to seek for payback at all costs". After that my account was listed in a mass report in the FoG-Forum and the ban followed. To be honest I tried to scam two people with but they didn't fall for that. After I calmed down, the next day or so, I decided to make up my mind, create a new Steam-Account and get out of CS GO-Trading but I still wanted to play the game, so I bought it and I'm still playing on that account until now. After a while I bought myself some skins again and wanted to gamble/bet with them. The problem was that Steam created the Mobile-Authentification for website-log in (this "code thing" to log in on CSGL and other 3rd party sites) so I had to make a dicision. I headed back to my old Steam-Account deleted my phone number from there so that I can use it on my new account and set the profile to private (to say I've abandoned it). I knew that I can't get access to this account anymore but that was ok for me because I wanted to leave it behind. After some time again I realised I got banned on my new account also, that was reallly frustrating but I said to myself:"You already lost one account to your silliness, don't do this again!", that worked I just took it how it was. Then I made a break from CS because I lost the motivation and also my rejected appeal was a reason, partly. Now I'm back and I want to start clear, without bans, without any bad reputation. I was as honest as I can be and I hope you understand my situation. Also I want to apologize to "Someone" for impersonating him/her, I really regret this. Regards  ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":72,"locked":1,"creator_id":275,"modificator_id":275,"created_at":"26.01.2017 16:39:20","updated_at":"2017-01-26 16:45:59","state":"Archived","assignee":"

First off, I want clear evidence that I am the 'alt' of the banned account. If evidence shown doesn't prove anything my ban was of an Assumption. My REP has been ruined because of assumption? I hope not. NOW SECONDLY I have details regarding the chargeback. It wasn't a chargeback that was done just for the money back. It was a forced Chargeback. We didn't even have control of the chargeback nor could we reverse it. The main reason was because the card that was used was hijacked and was used to make unauthorized payments. Many of them were high value payments. Because of this the payments that were unauthorized were chargebacked. Hence why it was called a "Fraudulent Dispute". The payments to 'major' companies were excempted because those payments were paid physicaly but payments that were to 'nonmajor' companies/online companies were reversed/chargebacked as the unauthorized payments were done through gateways such as PayPal and Stripe. Obviously this was a hard time and it caused a lot of shit for us to go thorugh. One of these is me being restricted from doing things and rep being ruined.  Please consider and read [b]throughly[/b] before you instantly deny this. I have no legal documents/files that show the unauthorized payments as they were a while ago. ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":209,"locked":1,"creator_id":303,"modificator_id":303,"created_at":"14.02.2017 11:22:48","updated_at":"2017-02-14 13:14:49","state":"Archived","assignee":"
